article: Mrs Smith is thirty-eight. She has two  _  . She looks very smart with fair and always tries to keep thin. She hopes  to keep  young and never eats  any  meat. She doesn't want others to know how  _  she is. Mrs Smith works in an office next to her home. It was raining heavily one morning. The head of  _  office went out to join a meeting. The woman had  _  to do. So she began to talk with Mr Zhang about her birthday party. Mr Zhang is an old man  _  glasses. He works in the same office. 'My family bought me a fresh cake,' said the woman. ' It smelled very  _  ! And I put nineteen candles on it --- one for a year!' ' Really?' asked Mr Zhang . He  _  very surprised. ' How did you burn ( )  _  of the ends ( ) at the same time? '
